Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: The Australian people are gearing up for the Federal budget and social media is abuzz with reactions. Amidst calls for an increase in JobSeeker payments from Homelessness Australia and the committee tasked with investigating JobSeeker rates the Labor party determines not to make an increase in May. Meanwhile General Practitioners press for changes to make healthcare affordable as tough economic times are forecasted. The LNP is pushing for full funding of the Ring Road project in Rockhampton and the budget is raising concerns about what it might entail.
